website_summaries.verdict: Two distinct floors will feel like luxury living for your rabbit and small pets.
pros: We love it holds up to the outdoors and wet weather conditions
Comes with a total of four doors
Large layout is appreciated by those who typically build their own hutches
cons: Some found that the wood started to warp after just a few weeks

customer_reviews.title: Great for my two holland lops
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hutch for about 2 months and I have no complaints. It's great for my two holland lop bunnies. It didn't take too long to assemble, the only thing is the directions don't specify which back piece goes to the top or bottom and I of course had them wrong so I had to unscrew them and switch them.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: This is my second hutch like this. I keep mine inside and love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second hutch like this. I keep mine inside and love it. It's attractive and gives my dwarf bunny tons of room to romp. I've seen others complain about a funny smell....it smells like wood lol. The instructions are somewhat lacking but my boyfriend and I were still able to assemble within 45 minutes and that was with us stopping to fix drinks lol.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great hutch for guinea pigs
customer_reviews.text: Great hutch! I bought this for my two guinea pigs. Nicely made and the doors have metal edges so they can't chew. I don't pull the floors out to clean as it's easier for me to scoop it out since I use wood shavings for bedding. I took cardboard to put along the edges on the bottom so shavings don't get kicked out and it works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bethanybax

customer_reviews.title: But wait, there's a trap door!
customer_reviews.text: So, I wanted two girl bunnies. I got this hutch so that there was enough space for the bunnies and also, in case they didn't get along, there's a trap door that closes the top floor from the bottom floor. Well... One of the bunnies turned out to be male so the trap door is keeping him away from the female bunny and hopefully not getting me any extra bunnies in the near future. The hutch is quite large but not difficult to put together. I did it alone. I would suggest putting it together a few days before getting your new pet since it did smell a bit strongly. The smell dissipated after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great value--well made and roomy. Excellent design.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value. We have 2 of these (one indoor and one outdoor). They're perfect. The dual slide-out drawers are very easy to clean (although we use a litterbox on the bottom one and therefore don't have much cleanup otherwise.) For our outdoor one we installed a K&H Small Animal Outdoor Heated Pet Pad in the top level and added a piece of Plexiglas covering the wire section of the top cage door to better contain heat. I treated the outdoor one with Thompson's water seal before assembling, and we keep it under a covered porch. I wouldn't expect it to hold up to the elements at all otherwise. Happy bunny; happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Markus33

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking cage for bunny
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cage for my 7 mo old rabbit. Fairly easy to put together. Like any pre-built cage, it is not super sturdy, so we did add some additional supports to make it a little stronger. The rabbit loves it, but unfortunately also loves to chew on it. The cage is used indoors and has a fence-type thing around it to give him more space to run. He has chewed on the edges of both of the doors when they are open and is able to quickly make quite a dent. Overall I am happy with the cage, I just wish the rabbit didn't want to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Loy

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Great hutch for indoor use. Fairly easy to assemble, clean and maintain. • Note that a rabbit will chew on all the corners so you might apply a non-toxic deterrent as needed. • Go easy on the door latches or you may need to replace them • The elbow/arm that holds the roof up tends to get stuck as there's nothing to support it. I added a long screw to keep the arm from falling all the way down and attached a wine cork to protect the rabbit (photo attached). • I wouldn't recommend this for outdoor use unless protected from rain and direct sunlight
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddy

customer_reviews.title: I have had the hutch for just under 3 months ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the hutch for just under 3 months and I'm about to put it by the curb. It is AWFUL!!!! First the support beams didn't fit properly, and of course this was after everything else was already assembled and this was one of the very last steps. Within the last 2 weeks I've had the two hinges break on the same door and the trimming come off. Save your money and buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!! Two dead Rabbits with One Month!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am consoling both of my children right now as we just buried the second rabbit that has died in this cage! We thought the first incident was a freak accident as our smallest bunny was found at the bottom of the ramp injured and barely able to move. The emergency vet confirmed he had broken his neck as a result of an accident in the cage. Today, a much larger rabbit has also died as a result from a fall in the same cage. This is inexcusable and I feel the manufacturers are responsible and my family is suffering.
customer_reviews.author: jbsterling

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This cage is not used for outside, it's in-house. In my opinion, I don't think the wood would hold up in the outdoor element. Easy to clean, I put food & water on the first level for my rabbit, he uses the top portion for sleeping or watching TV. It looks nice in my man-cave, it's not built for outdoors, I recommend if you buy this, keep it indoors. During the holiday parties, I get many people asking me where I got this cage. It looks nice, also easy to put together, I'm not good at building things or putting things together, this is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The item in the picture is not what what was in the box. They look the same but it's made with a much cheaper wood composite. The pieces are even put together right, and the pre drilled srew holes are not even in the correct places, and the reinforcement brackets don't even lineup. The picture on the instructions and the parts dont match. When you try to assemble it the front isn't even the same size as the back so nothing lines up and then the roof won't fit. Thos thing is a hot mess,Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Great access from the top with locking hinge
customer_reviews.text: Bunny hutch haven! Great access from the top with locking hinge, and doors that open wide on the upper and lower floors for cleaning. The floors are solid and covered with a protected "plastic". We have a large Rex and this hutch is a good size for him. Easy to clean and use. We applied a protective oil to the outside for better water proof, and put on better security latches on the lower sliding tray and front doors, as we have raccoons in the area who can open these types of slide latches. Great design!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Ann

customer_reviews.title: Wood is way to soft
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I have had this maybe 6 months, it's a really pretty hutch, it looks nice indoors. Only thing, it's made of super soft wood! So needless to say, I'm not sure it will last a full year, they have already started chewing the actual side walls, not to mention the doors. I've had to reinforce it a bit, and try to distract them but the damage is done. If you know your bunnies don't chew a lot, it's an awesome hutch... if they chew maybe not the best option.
customer_reviews.author: emily grossman

customer_reviews.title: NOPE
customer_reviews.text: GARBAGE!! There are more broken pieces than not!! $200 and I’ve got a price of junk. Buyer beware! It’s cheap THIN wood that somehow smells like cedar? I’ll make due because we NEED the hutch but this is not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Great for ~Small~ Animals!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! perfect size for my 2 mini lop rabbits. they are each about 4 lbs. Many different parts of the hutch seem very weak/fragile. an animal larger than 4 lbs might be able to break out. UPDATE: My 5 lb. rabbit was able to break out of the cage. He broke the lock on the large lower level door. I had to zip tie it. I am now only able to use one of the two doors. Not a big deal, but not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to separate 2 rabbits. The most important feature was missing-the trap door which separates the top from the bottom. That is supposed to be installed at the factory, but it was overlooked. The pictures in the instructions did not match the actual items enclosed. Several items were also missing although the box was intact. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but could be worse for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about a month now: The box it came in was completely torn up and parts of the wood where showing and damaged the latches are poor quality and I expect them to break sometime this year the plastic floor has no traction at all so I am using old towels as "bedding" the hardest part to put together was the lid but I was assembling it solo so that's to be expected other then that my bunny does like it and it does seem like I will have it for a while
customer_reviews.author: Hannibal710

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived undamaged, simple instructions and overall was fairly easy to put together. There were punched holes where you need to drill so it was easy to line everything up. We couldn't figure out the hinges, the screw holes may have been too low as it sounded like the wood began to crack when we tested opening the top. We decided to leave them off, there are so many ways to get in and clean or just remove the tray we have no reason to use the top lid realty.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My hutch arrived with cracked, flimsy pieces. This is seriously a piece of junk. My husband continued to put it together because we were desperate for a place for our bunnies. One of the panels arrived cracked in 2 places. The hutch directions were difficult to follow and even after assembly, it looks awkward and as though the pieces are not where they should be. I wouldn’t recommend this as my lions head bunny almost made a break after the first hour because of a gap. Poor quality. Poor directions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This took 4 people about 30 minutes to build. The pre-drilled holes don't line up, so we had to use a drill to put it together. Seems sturdy enough. Plenty of room for our little bunny. The removable trays make it easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We've had this hutch for a couple of months now. We keep it indoors and have one bunny housed in it (when she's not roaming around the room) and I feel as though it has held up well (set aside from our bunny chewing the wood). It was easy to put together, its easy to clean, and its good product for the price. I would recommend it if you are looking for a cheaper hutch that can last a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Talkbooks

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit hutch #1
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this hutch for our Dwarf rabbit. She loves it! She has plenty of room to roam and spread out when she wants to. I have no complaints so far! Granted, it's only been about 3 days. It definitely seems sturdy enough. It's real wood, which is nice. And I like that it doesn't have any wire on the floor! Plus it's easy to clean because it has 4 separate doors. And you can close the ramp off to clean it so bunny doesn't HAVE to come out if she doesn't want to.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Sopko

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Decided to put this together to see how it ends up, cheap door latches, the wood very light weight, terrible instructions. There are no drilled pilot holes for any of the screws like most brands, very poor construction. Got it all together, very unstable, you would have to brace this yourself if you ever wanted it to last. Definitely wouldn't brave the elements outdoors. It looks nice but that's about it, not a quality product. I purchased a pets-fit bunny hutch back in November 2018 and 5 times the quality this one is. I don't want to take this apart but I think I want a refund, not recommended, very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: keith wyatt

customer_reviews.title: I like this hutch
customer_reviews.text: I like this hutch, but it wouldn't work for my Flemish Giant Rabbits. It isn't wide enough. It would work great for most smaller normal sized rabbits. It wasn't to bad to build, but the directions are fair to poor. But I figured it out. I can't use the ramp for my big bunnies. I will keep searching for a big hutch. I use it indoors, however, it is made for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money poor quality materials did not match each other one piece was too big one piece was too small some pieces didn't match but the connecting pieces some pieces were missing it took three hours to figure out how to put it together to where it would stay sturdy for my rabbit I'm very disappointed and I feel like I wasted my money I feel like I'm going to have to buy another rabbit hut cuz I don't think this one will last
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Make it more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The screws work loose, and the latches bend easy. My rabbit kept getting out and I had to change the lock hardware on the bottom to stop her. The screws on the hinges work loose. I like the pans and ease of cleaning. I just wish it would have been built to be more sturdy. It feels like its made of balsa wood.
customer_reviews.author: Peegh

customer_reviews.title: The bunnies love the room and places to hide in it
customer_reviews.text: This house is cute but the bunnies are half of it the first night! Wood seems to soft. The bunnies love the room and places to hide in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Bettes

customer_reviews.title: broken pieces and diagram does not match the boards
customer_reviews.text: While the product is the typical kind of wood you can expect from a prepackaged kit, we were dissatisfied with the way it arrived. 3 of the pieces were cracked, or splintered. There is no option to message seller, and I was displeased with that. While the diagram did not entirely match the pieces we received, it was not a problem to build. It was enough to confuse my 12 year old, but with some adult coaching he was able to put the hutch together.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Koerner

customer_reviews.title: Good two story hutch.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this hitch for my daughters rabbit. It is a good hutch and the trays offer easy cleaning. However the rabbit had almost eaten away the wood frame sound each of the wire insert doors. I contacted the company to inquire about purchasing replacement doors however that is not an option. Be aware if your animal loves chewing on wood, ours loves this one.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent User

customer_reviews.title: Poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this, I don't know if it was just this item but it had cracked wood, screw hole guides were missing or misplaced, some pieces also manufactured wrong or oddly shaped. I also bought this used from a third party seller and the box fell apart upon opening so it can't be returned. I don't even know at this point if I can get a refund, I will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: James Ford

customer_reviews.title: Super easy build
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old daughter and husband built this. Super easy build. If it's for a rabbit though. If your rabbits a chewer you may need to duct tape the heck out of it to prevent it. Mine is. A mini Rex and he's insane. But love love the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: The product was nothing like I expected. I asked for a refund, instead they promised me 1/2 my money back. I never received the half refund. Missing hatch door and other features.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Venezia

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly with 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly with 2 people, rabbit loves it but figured out how to shake the cage doors until the latch comes open. We use ours in our living room, it looks very nice, most people don't even realize it's a cage until they hear him moving.
customer_reviews.author: The Fug Family

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hutch for our bunny!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about his hutch being too small for my 7 lb rabbit, but it is actually very roomy and she absolutely loves it! It took my about a half hour to put together with just a drill and a couple of extra hands to help hold pieces. The wood is soft but I found the quality to be very good and the hutch is sturdy. I looked at many indoor hutches before purchasing this one and none of them had great reviews. I was hesitant to purchase this one but it has definitely exceeded my expectations and I would not hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again - poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Can’t recommend this hutch. The dimensions are calculated based upon the roof panel so the hutch is actually smaller than you’d expect. The design is poor and overall the quality is not what I expected. If I had it do do over again, I would purchase the TRIXIE 2-Story hutch. It is a much better product and worth the extra money. Don’t spend you money on an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Howard T Church

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to put together. I have mine indoors so I don’t know how it would hold up in the weather. My only complaint is the trap door hinge broke due to flimsy wood in the back panel(I have to keep my two boys separate so it remains closed). I used another nail with deeper thread to drill it in instead of the one provided and now it holds.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great for 4H rabbits!
customer_reviews.text: We have two buck rabbits and use this hutch on nice days outdoors. It actually sits on our porch in the shade. Being able to keep them separated was very important to us, as these are 4H show rabbits that cannot be neutered according to competition rules. We simply did not install the ramp. It was easy to put together and has been easy to maintain and clean. It has been a perfect addition to our rabbit project!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit able to get out
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hutch to keep in our house for a rabbit. I love the size of the hutch and I like the way it looks. It did come with a couple pieces that were damaged but we were able to make them work. However within about 2 weeks our rabbit has figured out how to open the doors by lifting up on them to unlock the latch and get out. So we will be buying new latches. This was not a huge deal for us because the hutch is in the house but this could be pretty bad if the hutch was outside.
customer_reviews.author: chad walterman

customer_reviews.title: some flaws but overall is great.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great although my rabbits did chew on it a lot and their pea stained it forever and when I put bedding in it the rabbits would kick it out and make a mess and also the bedding got stuck in the space where the wire goes in to so we switched to fleece in it instead and the rabbits go in and out of it when I let them out to run around in my room and the bunnies like the stairs it holds up very well not even wobbling when they are on it and it is very easy for them to get up it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fico

customer_reviews.title: Not the best construction or directions
customer_reviews.text: The hutch that came was different than the one in the picture. The instructions were vague at best. It awhile to figure out the correct spacing because if you don’t allow room, the trays won’t slide. Nothing is mentioned in the directions about this. Several pieces came cracked and our was missing the door to close the 2nd floor. The wood is just a cheap pine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pragg

customer_reviews.title: Not Premium Quality, but a Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: The wood is light and a little flimsy, but rabbits aren't heavy. Biggest disappointment was that the drawers are pretty much impossible to pull out while there's any bedding in them, but it wasn't a deal-breaker. Our hutch is covered by an awning... not sure I'd trust it to the elements without some additional weatherproofing. For the price, though, it's a good deal and I'm happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very large!!!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the wood has splintered. It’s really large and my rabbit is very happy with her new home. Her bedding was spilling out of the sides on the bottom floor quiet often and it was very messy. But my husband added some wood to each side to prevent it from happening anymore and now it’s perfect. Also my 2 yr old broke the locks but that’s not the manufactures fault. We were able to fix those as well. Overall very happy
customer_reviews.author: chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & functionality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality & functionality. Attractive enough to use indoors--looks like fine furniture of the Arts & Crafts style. The door leading from the bottom to the top compartment is very narrow. Make sure your pet will fit through it!
customer_reviews.author: Ptera

customer_reviews.title: Decent hutch but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice layout and easy to clean but it’s not very sturdy and the wood splits when your put the screws in. I wouldn’t purchase again but it’ll do.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues but still nice
customer_reviews.text: I would really love to give this a 5. It’s really nice but it took some handy work. It’s fairly easy to assemble but many of the parts were not in good condition and the flap that covers the ramp came installed too far to the left to close. The directions also fail to show enough detail a few times. Overall the quality just needs to be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Very unsturdy, cheap, falling apart after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap wood/mdf. This is not sturdy at all. We have had it about a month and a half and it is already falling apart. The trays you pull out to clean do not come out easily and get caught, causing the liner to lift up. One of our bunnies has chewed through part of the cage. Do not waster your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Cortni

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The first package I received was missing parts, and the product I received did not match the product I ordered on amazon, and the instructions did not match the product I received. Once I received the 2nd package I noticed that one of the pieces was cracked. Do not waste your time with this product, it isn’t even worth half of the price.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love it almost as much as Lilbit does!! So easy to put together, and it looks like a million bucks. He loves to run up and down the ladder. It is so easy to clean and I love that I can close the top for cleaning without having to worry about him getting out. I would gladly buy another!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hutch!
customer_reviews.text: This hutch looks very well made. I bought it for my daughter who has 2 Lionhead bunnies. My wife said it was easy to put together if you know what you're doing. My daughter said her rabbits chewed on it a little, then stopped after a few days. Definitely worth the price. Only thing I would change is make the trays deeper, so you could put some bedding down, other than that we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money on this.
customer_reviews.text: Rabbits ate the wood, and were able to thump hard enough to undo latches. Rabbit also thumped straight through upper floor, leaving a huge hole. Heading to the burn pile after less than 2 months. Don't waste your time or money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DePoortere

customer_reviews.title: Okay for price, door broke within minutes...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think it is what it is (not best quality, but functional. BUT it took one jump on the closed "door" between the layers and it broke!!! I have 2 bunnies that sometimes need to be separated and that was why this would be ideal...disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Esbensen

customer_reviews.title: **PIECE OF SHIT**
customer_reviews.text: **DO NOT ORDER THIS** It is nothing like the description. It doesn't have a finish on it like the description said. There is no door on the ladder hole, there is no coating on the ladder. The wood is unfinished and needs sanding. It's flimsy and it shakes with my 4lb rabbit in it. It sucks, if I could give 0 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Soriano

customer_reviews.title: Bunny like it
customer_reviews.text: There were no preset holes drilled for the screws. It was solid once we got it together.
customer_reviews.author: K.V. T.

customer_reviews.title: Wood very thin and not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and half of the parts were broken and damaged. I felt like someone returned this item before and they repacked it and sent it to me. Not a very sturdy product for an animal.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Came with no instructions on how to put it together.
customer_reviews.text: At this time we are still unable to put this together because it came with no instructions. May have to return if we can't figure it out. Hoping someone will contact us soon about this.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic locks
customer_reviews.text: This product was a little difficult to put together, some pieces didn't fit right and i had to rig them a bit. Also be careful the "locking mechanisms" are plastic and if you have a big enough or smart enough Bunny they can bend and pop the locks and get out. mine has escaped abou 3 times now. i had to spend more money to get different locks to put on the doors. Over all I like it just a few issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A NICE HUTCH FOR OUR RABBIT
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A NICE HUTCH FOR OUR RABBIT. HE LOVES IT. KIND OF FLIMSY BUT STILL GLAD WE PURCHASED IT. WE'VE SEEN OTHERS SIMULAR TO THIS ONE AND THEY ARE MORE EXPENSIVE. GOOD BUY!! WOULD RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Regina D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Hutch but Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality hutch, was not easy to put together and the pieces didn’t even fit. The good news is that the seller’s customer service was excellent and I was extremely satisfied with how they handled the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Schoonover

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together You can even do it with ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together You can even do it with one person a great way to put one or two rabbits either inside or outside
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Bunnies new crib
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these. My bunnies love them! It's really easy to clean with the slide out trays. It was fairly easy to put together. I have indoor rabbits and these look nice in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amie DeMasi

customer_reviews.title: Can’t pull top shelf out to clean
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. The ramp screws into the back wall so you can’t really pull the top shelf out without unscrewing the ramp - after a while the screw hole gets ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow Polkadot 666

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy and roomy and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy and large. Best hutch I have seen or bought so far and at an incredible price!
customer_reviews.author: Shana D.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together but it’s very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together but it’s very flimsy. It’s good for my rabbit as long as I don’t move it. It IS easy to clean out, I appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: D. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, not worth cost, returned the item
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, cheap materials. Probably would not last a month. Not very big, weird cheap plastic liner floors. Not sturdy, could not be used outside. I returned, quality not good
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Fake piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This is literally a piece of crap.... it’s cheap fake wood. No parts match up, it’s not sturdy. You can blow on it and knock it down. I looked all over and I thought this one had ok reviews. But this is a legit joke. Idk where to even order a normal real bunny house?
customer_reviews.author: briellemg

customer_reviews.title: We love it. He loves it too
customer_reviews.text: A 5 star resort for our bunny. We love it. He loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived within days, good quality and my 7 month old lion head mix loves it. Putting it together was rather simple even with the little instructions included, it took me about an hour and a half my myself with a screw driver to put it together. There was a small price of the wood splintered and broken but it Was a minor interior issue.
customer_reviews.author: April harrison

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The first one we received was great! The second one was not at all like the first one there was no green turf on the steps the sides were different. Requested a replacement same thing and it was damaged! Don’t get it!
customer_reviews.author: margiit

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s good quality for the price and my bunny loves it. Only thing is the clamps on the doors seem a bit flimsy to me but they’ve held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: has not held very well. My bunnies have chewed it to pieces,am still using though
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hardman

customer_reviews.title: This is a great size for 2
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived today, and my husband and I are both very impressed with the quality of this hutchand it is aesthetically pleasing! Can't wait to get our bunnies in a few weeks! This is a great size for 2 rabbits
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Must have for house rabbits
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautiful and easy to out together. My bunny loves it so much. She hangs out upstairs even when the door is open!
customer_reviews.author: Lyrod

customer_reviews.title: Not good for rabbits
customer_reviews.text: It looked quality online, but in person it is soft wood, nothing stops the bunnies from chewing it up or liquid soaking through wood.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hope

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsy, but a great value and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Assembled it in minutes. Great value for the price. Slightly flimsy due to light-weight wood/construction, but sturdy enough for what it is made for.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jones

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit hutch
customer_reviews.text: Great hutch for the price! Though the rabbits like to chew on the wood...
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER OLSON

customer_reviews.title: but it's perfect for our two little bunnies on our covered porch
customer_reviews.text: Fairly simple to put together. Yes, it's a little on the flimsy side, but it's perfect for our two little bunnies on our covered porch. I think I would want something sturdier if it was in the yard, exposed to rain and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Alison H Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a metal cage
customer_reviews.text: Product come damaged. Bunny chewed the cage up immediately. Can’t get replacement back in package.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Guyott

customer_reviews.title: I would like the trays to be deeper
customer_reviews.text: I would like the trays to be deeper, the rabbits slip on the ground. It's good for our little rabbits, our big rabbits would have been squished
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Purdy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product easy to build
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product easy to build, looks great, and my rabbit loves it. I would definitely recommend this cage for a bunny owner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hutch my rabbits like it very much they always ...
customer_reviews.text: Great hutch my rabbits like it very much they always run up and down the ramp. The only thing was the door got a little lose but it was easy to fix. Love this hutch. 🐰
customer_reviews.author: tankman

customer_reviews.title: Feels like pressed chip boards
customer_reviews.text: Product is made with cheap materials considering the cost. All parts came broken nicks chips scratches cracks and chuncks missing. Feels like pressed chip boards. The cage has a nice height and width but it’s really very narrow and doesn’t leave much space. We decided to go with this style for easy cleaning. I called customer care to receive a condensation to keep due to the large size and weight and have yet to receive my discount 😕 unfortunately I would not recommend this hutch to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Wish it was longer for sure but with some modification I have made it work.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Pull out trays could be deeper so that ...
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Not very strong. Disappointed. Pull out trays could be deeper so that if your bunny pees outside of his litter box, it doesn't trickle down the walls and out the bottom. YUK!
customer_reviews.author: Prsbr3

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Only have used it for a month and is falling apart
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor use!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy build, definitely not designed for outdoors, as I discovered. Raccoons and easily open it not to mention a small dog.
customer_reviews.author: S. Folsom

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Wish the trays could be a couple inches deeper.
customer_reviews.text: 2 Guinea pigs and a satin rabbit, indoors. Clean it once a week, empty the rabbits litter tray twice a week. Looks great with plenty of room. The trays are too shallow though. Shavings get everywhere. Started using pre pass on the lower level. Guinea pigs are filthy critters.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions to assemble this look like they were drawn by the chinese child who made this product.
customer_reviews.author: JubbaJubbaMan

customer_reviews.title: Great hutch
customer_reviews.text: Love this hutch! It is easy to clean and to get into. It looks really nice- we even had it in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Vince L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My rabbits love their new home
customer_reviews.text: My rabbits love their new home, it looks exactly like the picture and is a more stylish addition to our living room than their old crate. There's plenty of room for my two dwarf rabbits.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sloss

customer_reviews.title: The wood is not very durable. The metal guards ...
customer_reviews.text: The wood is not very durable. The metal guards were not put on right. We were missing pieces. The trays do not slide well and the rabbits learned to open the latches.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: The hutch is working out great, it did not have any funky smells
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our rabbit (who is a pet and not food). The hutch is working out great, it did not have any funky smells. The directions were a bit lacking though. When you look at the two front doors they are separate and one is supposed to go on top and the other down below. It took a little bit of thinking and putting the puzzle together. Recommend a drill to help put it together quicker. Over all though it is pretty solid. The wood is a bit cheap feeling. I am surprised the rabbit has not eaten the thing yet. I would recommend getting it though!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I have a bunny 1%er now lol.. no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert White

customer_reviews.title: Bunny Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Bunny lover her new digs...! very roomy than a cage.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up!
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit flimsy & tray is warping, the latches are loose the bunny has broken out 2x's:( The bunny has chewed up the hutch within a short time so we will need to repair We've only had for 1 month & a half:(
customer_reviews.author: Smm04

customer_reviews.title: This hutch is awesome! It is a bit tricky to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: This hutch is awesome! It is a bit tricky to get the first main base pieces set up but it is well made an has been amazing with carpeting on the bottom pull out drawers, after our rabbits had a litter option
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! It is perfect for my 2 bunnies. I have it indoors and they sleep here and hang out in bad weather (they have an 8 ft x 8 ft outdoor mansion for play time etc.) I painted the outside of mine and left the inside alone. It is seriously the best price I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E.

customer_reviews.title: Great size for price
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together just a lot of screwing but basic. Hopefully my lion hair like it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: ok overall.. it's made of thin wood so it wont last long with chewers!
customer_reviews.text: Made cheap.. I could see my rabbit and chinchilla chewing through this quick.. Cute design and it looks nice but the wood is like a thin cedar.. Will be chewed up with my little critters.. Also..Only the top part has a nesting box.. The bottom is all open and the top that lays down for the ladder part isn't flat..
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L

customer_reviews.title: My bunnies love their new home !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and serves its purpose . I currently have two bunnies living in here and they seem quite happy . Enough room to roam around and prettt easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: kristy ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It is a good product for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is a good product for the price. It's much bigger than I expected and has plenty of space for my little bunny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Merax Rabbit Hutch Wooden House Wooden Cage for Small Animals (Rabbit Hutch#1)
feature_bullets: Sturdy Construction & Weatherproof: Constructed by premium natural fir wood and painted with eco-friendly waterproof non-toxic varnish. The original wood is firm and natural for your beloved pet, which ensures the safety of your lovely pet. Besides, due to eco-friendly paint, the cage is waterproof, anti-corrosion and also UV-resistant, which offers long-lasting lifespan to provide a warm house for pet all the time.

Comfortable habitat: Outside bunny hutch is designed with raised legs to keep it lift off ground for extra security and dry environment.The raised perch of the pet cage keeps your small animals safe, dry and warm, especially in the rainy cold days. And the whole space with roof would keep your lovely pets away from the heat and direct sunlight in summer.

Removable tray, ingenious design: An easy-to-clean removable sliding pan in PVC plastic covers more than half of the upper level. A solid front-door near the sleeping quarters locks securely with a metal slide bolt, along with an additional wire door upstairs and wire and wood door below.

Spacious space: Your bunny or rabbit need a sturdy house for his or her own to play, eat and sleep. Your house also need a specialized place for you to interactive with your lovely pet. It is not only a space for your lovely pet, but also a place for you to bond with your lovely pets. PT-PC03 overall dimension 42.12*19.5*39.39 inch.

We packed chicken coop in package as good as we can, if there is any damaged parts, please contact us first and offer us pictures of damaged part, we will solve the problem as the way you want(discount or replacement)
